Introduction
NVIC_SCU001 App

Introduction

NVIC_SCU001 App is a low level App used by top level Apps for registering the SCU Event Handler callbacks. The Callback function are registered at runtime by top level Apps. NVIC_SCU001 Apps Interrupt Handler calls the respective callback functions if registered when a interrupt event occurs.

Scope

App specific handling of Interrupt Events

NVIC_SCU001_abbreviation

  1. API: Application Program Interface
  2. App: DAVE3 Application
  3. GUI: Graphical User Interface
  4. SW: Software

NVIC_SCU001_reference

XMC4500 Reference Manual.
